bindings.source_property_name: ((#score_int_val_r > 0) and (($ooze_container_index = 0 and #score_int_val < 16) or ($ooze_container_index = 1 and #score_int_val < 32) or ($ooze_container_index = 2 and #score_int_val < 48)))

((#score_int_val > 1 and $health_cell_index = 0) or (#score_int_val > 3 and $health_cell_index = 1) or (#score_int_val > 5 and $health_cell_index = 2) or (#score_int_val > 7 and $health_cell_index = 3) or (#score_int_val > 9 and $health_cell_index = 4) or (#score_int_val > 11 and $health_cell_index = 5) or (#score_int_val > 13 and $health_cell_index = 6) or (#score_int_val > 15 and $health_cell_index = 7))

((#score_int_val = 1 and $health_cell_index = 0) or (#score_int_val = 3 and $health_cell_index = 1) or (#score_int_val = 5 and $health_cell_index = 2) or (#score_int_val = 7 and $health_cell_index = 3) or (#score_int_val = 9 and $health_cell_index = 4) or (#score_int_val = 11 and $health_cell_index = 5) or (#score_int_val = 13 and $health_cell_index = 6) or (#score_int_val = 15 and $health_cell_index = 7))

(($life_icon_index = 0 and #score_int_val > 0) or ($life_icon_index = 1 and #score_int_val > 1) or ($life_icon_index = 2 and #score_int_val > 2) or ($life_icon_index = 3 and #score_int_val > 3) or ($life_icon_index = 4 and #score_int_val > 4))
